features: FOR ACNE-PRONE SKIN - Specially formulated for oily skin, acne, large or clogged pores
POWERED BY NATURE - Infused with Succinic Acid to gently exfoliate, Minerice Enzyme Complex to deeply nourish skin, and Wintergreen Extract to moisturize.
EFFECTIVE CLEANSING - Silky, smooth cleanser exfoliates skin and removes dirt from pores, without stripping skin.
PROTECTIVE - Supports your skin's barrier health, calms existing blemishes, and cares for future breakouts.
POWERFULLY GENTLE - Free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, silicones, and artificial fragrance. Non-irritating, non-drying and safe for daily use for all skin types.
body.description: Clinically Proven to Clear Breakouts In Just 4 Weeks: Clinically proven to reduce acne by 33.4%*Clinically proven to reduce excess oil & sebum by 42.3%*100% agreed that Miracle Clear Collection is non-irritating**100% agreed skin felt completely cleansed without drying***100% were satisfied with the cleanser’s performance***97% agreed skin felt moisturized and hydrated***97% agreed skin felt soothed***84% experienced an improvement in acne inflammation, redness & swelling** **Based on a self-assessment of 32 subjects, aged 20-35, after 4 weeks of Rael’s Miracle Clear 3-step system use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clinically Proven to Clear Breakouts In Just 4 Weeks: Clinically proven to reduce acne by 33.4%*Clinically proven to reduce excess oil & sebum by 42.3%*100% agreed that Miracle Clear Collection is non-irritating**100% agreed skin felt completely cleansed without drying***100% were satisfied with the cleanser’s performance***97% agreed skin felt moisturized and hydrated***97% agreed skin felt soothed***84% experienced an improvement in acne inflammation, redness & swelling** **Based on a self-assessment of 32 subjects, aged 20-35, after 4 weeks of Rael’s Miracle Clear 3-step system use.

Refreshed & Conditioned Creamy lather gently removes dirt, pollutants, excess oil, and sebum while keeping skin clear and moisturized. Clean, Powerful Ingredients Infused with ingredients like Succinic Acid, moisturizing Wintergreen Extract, and Minerice Enzyme Complex to support the skin barrier. Sensitive Skin Safe Non-drying cleanser formulated specially for sensitive, acne-prone skin. Safe for all skin types.

Miracle Clear Exfoliating Cleanser Miracle Clear Clarifying Toner Miracle Clear Barrier Cream Miracle Clear Soothing Spot Gel Miracle Clear Pore Purifying Clay Mask Miracle Patch Invisible Spot Cover Benefit Gently cleanses skin to remove impurities Helps skins texture, and preps skin for additional skincare steps Delivers lasting hydration without leaving skin feeling greasy Targets emerging blemishes and active acne Minimizes the appearance of pores and reduces blackheads For surfaced acne and whiteheads Net Weight/Count 150ml/ 5.1 fl. oz 150ml/ 5.1 fl. oz 53ml/ 8.3 fl. oz 4ml/0.14oz 100ml/3.4oz 96 Count (10mm, 12mm) Key Ingredients Succinic Acid, Minerice Enzyme complex, Wintergreen Extract Succinic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, Vitamin B5 Panthenol Succinic Acid, Minerice Enzyme complex, Vitamin B5 Panthenol Cica Extract, Succinic Acid, Tea Tree Extract Papaya Extract, Jeju Mugwort Extract, Cica Extract Hydrocolloid Dressing Usage Use cleanser as first skincare step After cleansing, use toner to prep skin After toning, use cream to lock in moisture and hydration Apply directly to early stage spots Use during oily Luteal Phase Minimum of 4-8 hours. Can be used overnight. Vegan, Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Artificial Color & Fragrance Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Safe For All Skiin Types & All Ages ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Foams up quickly and just feels good on the skin. You literally just want to massage your skin. Amazing results after 2 weeks of use. Skin is clearer and soft with a touch of glow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It moisturizers my face and makes my skin look good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not exfoliating, but fantastic!!!
reviews.reviewText: Maybe on a microscopic level it exfoliates?? However, I am in love with this product anyways. Creamy face soap that clears my adult skin without stripping it, or over-moisturizing! I have used the entire bottle and will continue to buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: All natural, cleans well, no scent, leaves my face feeling slightly dry but not too bad. I think it was worth the price. It suds up very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I used my boyfriends, so I bought my own
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend had this cleanser, and I was intrigued by the packaging and the message. But let me tell you... This cleanser is super soft, lightweight, and very moisturizing. I feel clean after use, and I use this daily. The price is worth the product purchase. Before buying, see if someone close to you has it so you can try it. ITS AMAZING. Happy shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love love love this face wash! leaves my face feeling very clean and soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser was noted for reducing facial oiliness. While it smells great and cleans very well, I haven't noticed that my skin is less oily. Good value as a cleanser though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An amazing cleanser!
reviews.reviewText: Such a lovely cleanser, gentle but works extremely effectively!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the feel of this on my face
